TopicTitle: Suspiciously Affirm Your Status As A Human

Articles.Content: @Nazalassa I put π instead of 0 I am on mobile right now and using gboard

Ah OK

Just I had the "-À" by reverse-binary-ing (?) the bits to ASCII. As the charater π is not ASCII it has led to some problems.
Sorry for my mis-interpret-ance (?).

OK guys I now seriously doubt if I'm a robot.

When I registered on the KSP forums it asked to choose pictures that contain bicycles to prove I'm a human. Now I'm trying to register on PaintDotNet forums and it asks me "what do cows drink". Now I'm really curious. WHAT DO COWS DRINK??? IS THIS A FAMOUS ENGLISH JOKE THAT I DON'T KNOW? I'M NOT NATIVE ENGLISH SPEAKER...

Edited May 25, 2022 by CFYL

3 hours ago, CFYL said:

OK guys I now seriously doubt if I'm a robot.

When I registered on the KSP forums it asked to choose pictures that contain bicycles to prove I'm a human. Now I'm trying to register on PaintDotNet forums and it asks me "what do cows drink". Now I'm really curious. WHAT DO COWS DRINK??? IS THIS A FAMOUS ENGLISH JOKE THAT I DON'T KNOW? I'M NOT NATIVE ENGLISH SPEAKER...

10/10

You are human.

I would think Cows drink water. Only young calves drink milk.

Therefore I am human.

9/10
Treating young beings (the calves) as inferior and write them from small letter inlike the adult Cows, is so human.

I'm adult and drink cow milk. Thus, I'm a European human, a Europhuman.

10/10 because only humans need to create new words.

I play KSP

5/10. AI bots and non-human life forms can be taught to play KSP.

Like my fellow humans, I felt saddened by killing Jeb in a tragic jet plane accident.

10/10 only humans can lie, jeb cannot die.

Hey I rhymed that last sentence and am human so I recognized that it rhymed like my fellow earthlings that live on this strange planet can.

5/10
Which planet? The Earth is a Sun's moon.

10/10

1/10
Everyone can say 10/10

I drink banana milk-shakes

6/10

Machines would not have a need to drink banana milk shakes. However you could still be an non-human who has developed a penchant for consuming the tasty concoction.

This gives me the idea of using banana milk shake as a component for tres leche cake. Culinary experimentation confirms I am human.

0/10 GLaDOS LIKES CAKE

I can play TF2 in a terrible, n00by style. Am I a human?

1/10
People play Minecraft, with its realistically cubic environment.

I'm not exactly a human, because last time I played modded Minecraft with smooth shapes.

9/10

Eye bee uh hooman naught uh naught hooman or lezahrd hooman.

8/10
Maybe lizards can say "hoo", "z", "hrd", but unlikely "eye".

I can pronounce vowels, I'm aaaa  humaaaan!

10/10

You didn't use a spell check.

I can see colours, therefore I am a Hue Man.

1/10
You belong to SaturnNation.

I can operate with a computer mouse. I'm a human.

1/10

A human would operate with surgical tools.

I can use a computer cat therefore I am human.

(these really existed but weren't that popular, they were the forerunner to the pad area you find on lap top computers. I have one somewhere.)

8/10 - you might have confused me there, you're probably not alien.

I rely on YouTube tutorials on Math other than my Math teacher's PDFs, therefore I must be human!

9/10
Only humans need teachers. The AI is self-teaching.

I know dark secrets of the AI, because I'm a human programmer a programmer of human a human software developer a developer of a software for humans just an IT.
I’m a human, 100%. After all, what other reason would I have for saying I’m one? Just to make it up? Haha, not me…

10/10
You know Haha (whoever this person is).

I'm a human because I can't think out how to twist this phrase in English one more way.
Helo, I am very human, Watch as I eat this burger with a very nice vegan timatoes.

10/10

All the posters who forget to rate the previous poster must be human.

I am human because I notice.

You are a notice. Humans send them sometimes.

I can distinguish a verb and a noun, so my mind is naturally human.
